contents.name: Melon Merge 3D
contents.description: A 3D spin on a popular physics puzzle game. Available on both the iOS and Android app stores.

contents.name: Stealth Pic
contents.description: A watchface that features your favorite pictures. Uses the AOD feature to save battery when not observed.

contents.name: Pomodoro Timer
contents.description: A stylish timer to keep yourself on task. Available with a variety of themes and silly sounds.
